member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer
member.summary: Makes a raster layer from a netCDF file.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input netCDF File (in)
The variable of the netCDF file used to assign cell values to the output raster. This is the variable that will be displayed, such as temperature or rainfall. (In, Required)
A netCDF dimension used to define the x, or longitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)
A netCDF dimension used to define the y, or latitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)
The name of the output raster layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.in_netCDF_file
member.summary: Input netCDF File (in)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.variable
member.summary: The variable of the netCDF file used to assign cell values to the output raster. This is the variable that will be displayed, such as temperature or rainfall. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.x_dimension
member.summary: A netCDF dimension used to define the x, or longitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.y_dimension
member.summary: A netCDF dimension used to define the y, or latitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.out_raster_layer
member.summary: The name of the output raster layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.band_dimension
member.summary: A netCDF dimension used to create bands in the output raster. Set this dimension if a multiband raster layer is required. For instance, altitude might be set as the band dimension to create a multiband raster where each band represents temperature at that altitude. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.dimension_values
member.summary: The value (such as 01/30/05) of the dimension (such as Time) or dimensions to use when displaying the variable in the output layer. By default, the first value of the dimension or dimensions will be used. This default value can also be altered on the netCDF tab of the Layer Properties dialog box. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.value_selection_method
member.summary: Specifies the dimension value selection method. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFRasterLayer.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.summary: The input netCDF raster layer, netCDF feature layer, or netCDF table view. (In, Required)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF
member.summary: Converts a raster dataset to a netCDF file.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input raster dataset or raster catalog. (In, Required)
The output netCDF file. The filename must have a .nc extension. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.in_raster
member.summary: The input raster dataset or raster catalog. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.out_netCDF_file
member.summary: The output netCDF file. The filename must have a .nc extension. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.variable
member.summary: The netCDF variable name that will be used in the output netCDF file. This variable will contain the values of cells in the input raster. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.variable_units
member.summary: The units of the data contained within the variable. The variable name is specified in the Variable parameter. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.x_dimension
member.summary: The netCDF dimension name used to specify x, or longitude coordinates. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.y_dimension
member.summary: The netCDF dimension name used to specify y, or latitude coordinates. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.band_dimension
member.summary: The netCDF dimension name used to specify bands. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.fields_to_dimensions
member.summary: The field or fields used to create dimensions in the netCDF file. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.RasterToNetCDF.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFTableView
member.summary: Makes a table view from a netCDF file.

member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input netCDF File (in)
The netCDF variable, or variables, used to create fields in the table view. (In, Required)
The name of the output table view. (Out, Required)

member.summary: Input netCDF File (in)

member.summary: The netCDF variable, or variables, used to create fields in the table view. (In, Required)

member.summary: The name of the output table view. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFTableView.row_dimension
member.summary: The netCDF dimension, or dimensions, used to create fields populated with unique values in the table view. The dimension, or dimensions, set here determine the number of rows in the table view and the fields that will be present. (In, Optional)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer
member.summary: Makes a feature layer from a netCDF file.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input netCDF File (in)
The netCDF variable, or variables, that will be added as fields in the feature attribute table. (In, Required)
A netCDF coordinate variable used to define the x, or longitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)
A netCDF coordinate variable used to define the y, or latitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)
The name of the output feature layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.in_netCDF_file
member.summary: Input netCDF File (in)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.variable
member.summary: The netCDF variable, or variables, that will be added as fields in the feature attribute table. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.x_variable
member.summary: A netCDF coordinate variable used to define the x, or longitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.y_variable
member.summary: A netCDF coordinate variable used to define the y, or latitude coordinates of the output layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.out_feature_layer
member.summary: The name of the output feature layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.row_dimension
member.summary: The netCDF dimension, or dimensions, used to create features with unique values in the feature layer. The dimension or dimensions set here determine the number of features in the feature layer and the fields that will be presented in the feature layer's attribute table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.z_variable
member.summary: A netCDF variable used to specify elevation values (z-values) for features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.m_variable
member.summary: A netCDF variable used to specify linear measurement values (m-values) for features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.dimension_values
member.summary: The value (such as 01/30/05) of the dimension (such as Time) or dimensions to use when displaying the variable in the output layer. By default, the first value of the dimension or dimensions will be used. This default value can also be altered on the netCDF tab of the Layer Properties dialog box. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.MakeNetCDFFeatureLayer.value_selection_method
member.summary: Specifies the dimension value selection method. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF
member.summary: Converts a point feature class to a netCDF file.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input feature class. (In, Required)

The field or fields used to create variables in the netCDF file. Four special fields—Shape.X, Shape.Y, Shape.Z, and Shape.M—can be used for exporting x-coordinates or longitude, y-coordinates or latitude, Z values, and M values of input features, respectively.field—A field in the input feature attribute table.{variable}—The netCDF variable name.{units}—The units of the data represented by the field. (In, Required)
The output netCDF file. The filename must have a .nc extension. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.in_features
member.summary: The input feature class. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.fields_to_variables
member.summary: The field or fields used to create variables in the netCDF file. Four special fields—Shape.X, Shape.Y, Shape.Z, and Shape.M—can be used for exporting x-coordinates or longitude, y-coordinates or latitude, Z values, and M values of input features, respectively.field—A field in the input feature attribute table.{variable}—The netCDF variable name.{units}—The units of the data represented by the field. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.out_netCDF_file
member.summary: The output netCDF file. The filename must have a .nc extension. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.fields_to_dimensions
member.summary: The field or fields used to create dimensions in the netCDF file. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.MultidimensionTools.FeatureToNetCDF.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.
